name: Shapist
description:
* BEST MOBILE GAME nomination at Indie Prize Amsterdam 2014
Shapist is a sliding block puzzle where you can do much more than just slide.
!!! Requires at least iPhone 4S !!!

We made Shapist to show how a classical game concept can be embraced by physics, experimentation and new mechanics. It is designed as a timeless, beautiful object without barriers between a player and the game. There are no words. No punishment. No tutorials. No time limits and no scores... Just you & 75 puzzles to solve.
